channel.title: Bossing points
channel.description: Ok, so i have the bossing kills working which means, you kill them you get a boss point. But now i am ready for the shop. I did everything but now i cant buy my bossing points in the bossing shop. one item will say zero boss points and then i tried to buy it but i couldnt. Any help?I think im missing some point. Or else you got a bossing shop tut?

item.title: Bossing points
item.dc:creator: @Pandora7 Pandora7
item.description:
@Pandora7 wrote:

Yes, i have all of that. Can you please help? Sumthing is wrong in my shopassistant.
Mabey teamviewer ?

Read full topic

item.title: Bossing points
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Do you even have the shop added in ShopAssistant.java? And is it grabbing the payment required from getSpecialItemValue, or straight from prices.txt?

Read full topic

item.title: Bossing points
item.dc:creator: @Pandora7 Pandora7
item.description:
@Pandora7 wrote:

Ive tried that but still doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Bossing points
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

ShopAssistant.java

Make sure that the case (the number for the item) in this format:

case ####: //item id return #; //how many points it will cost

is added under the switch in the specialItemValue method. This is all based upon the assumption that your using PI as well.

Read full topic
